nodes.text: Doellinism was a religion that worshiped Doellin on the planet Kinyen. Its tenets forbade violence, and forms of addiction such as alcohol, gambling, and spice. After the Galactic Empire bombarded the city of Malthee on Kinyen, a Doellinist temple was built in the ruins of the city.
Doellinist priests secretly met with agents of the Rebel Alliance.
